dyadP.name: Pawn Dyad
dyadP.description: Make two Pawn moves, no capturing.

dyadS.name: Spectre Dyad
dyadS.description: Make two Spectre moves, no capturing.

dyadW.name: Wraith Dyad
dyadW.description: Make two Wraith moves, no capturing.

dyadH.name: Herring Dyad
dyadH.description: Make two Herring moves, no capturing.

dyadN.name: Knight Dyad
dyadN.description: Make two Knight moves, no capturing.

dyadB.name: Bishop Dyad
dyadB.description: Make two Bishop moves, no capturing.

dyadR.name: Rook Dyad
dyadR.description: Make two Rook moves, no capturing.

dyadQ.name: Queen Dyad
dyadQ.description: Make two Queen moves, no capturing.

dyadK.name: King Dyad
dyadK.description: Make two King moves, no capturing.

dyadT.name: Templar Dyad
dyadT.description: Make two Templar moves, no capturing.

dyadM.name: Mystic Dyad
dyadM.description: Make two Mystic moves, no capturing.

dyadV.name: Vanguard Dyad
dyadV.description: Make two Vanguard moves, no capturing.

dyadZ.name: Zebra Dyad
dyadZ.description: Make two Zebra moves, no capturing.

dyadU.name: Unicorn Dyad
dyadU.description: Make two Unicorn moves, no capturing.

sumnP.name: Summon Pawn
sumnP.description: Summon a Pawn to an empty square.

sumnS.name: Summon Spectre
sumnS.description: Summon a Spectre to an empty square.

sumnW.name: Summon Wraith
sumnW.description: Summon a Wraith to an empty square.

sumnH.name: Summon Herring
sumnH.description: Summon a Herring to an empty square. A Herring must be captured if the move is legal.

sumnN.name: Summon Knight
sumnN.description: Summon a Knight to an empty square.

sumnB.name: Summon Bishop
sumnB.description: Summon a Bishop to an empty square.

sumnR.name: Summon Rook
sumnR.description: Summon a Rook to an empty square.

sumnQ.name: Summon Queen
sumnQ.description: Summon a Queen to an empty square.

sumnT.name: Summon Templar
sumnT.description: Summon a Templar to an empty square.

sumnM.name: Summon Mystic
sumnM.description: Summon a Mystic to an empty square.

sumnV.name: Summon Vanguard
sumnV.description: Summon a Vanguard to an empty square.

sumnZ.name: Summon Zebra
sumnZ.description: Summon a Zebra to an empty square.

sumnU.name: Summon Unicorn
sumnU.description: Summon a Unicorn to an empty square.

sumnX.name: Summon Exile
sumnX.description: Summon an Exile to an empty square. An Exile is a neutral piece that cannot be moved or captured.

sumnRQ.name: Royalty Queen
sumnRQ.description: Summon a Queen Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Queen.

sumnRT.name: Royalty Templar
sumnRT.description: Summon a Templar Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Templar.

sumnRM.name: Royalty Mystic
sumnRM.description: Summon a Mystic Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Mystic.

sumnRV.name: Royalty Vanguard
sumnRV.description: Summon a Vanguard Royalty condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square move like a Vanguard.

sumnRE.name: Entanglement
sumnRE.description: Summon an Entanglement condition to a square for 4 turns. Pieces on this square cannot move.

sumnRY.name: Hexweaver's Bind
sumnRY.description: Select a square, all squares along that file have entanglement for 4 turns.

sumnRZ.name: Hexweaver's Chain
sumnRZ.description: Select a square, all squares along that rank have entanglement for 4 turns.

sumnRA.name: Hexweaver's Tomb
sumnRA.description: Place a 3x3 block to fill each with entanglement and empty squares with exile for 4 turns.

offrH.name: Masquerade Ritual
offrH.description: Offer a friendly Pawn to gain a Herring summon arcana.  A Herring must be captured if the move is legal.

offrS.name: Sliding into Action
offrS.description: Offer a friendly Mystic to gain a Rook and Bishop summon arcana.

offrM.name: Equus Family Unites
offrM.description: Offer a friendly Templar or Queen to gain arcana summons of the Equus Family.

offrE.name: THE RUUUUUK
offrE.description: Offer a friendly Rook to gain a minor summon arcana.

offrR.name: Royal Offering Exchange
offrR.description: Offer a friendly Queen or Templar to gain a Mystic summon arcana

offrC.name: Chameleon's Traversal
offrC.description: Offer a friendly minor piece to gain a minor piece summon arcana.

offrA.name: Grave Offering
offrA.description: Offer any friendly piece (not King) to summon it's spirit back into play.

shftP.name: Pawn Strafe
shftP.description: Move a Pawn one square backwards, left or right, no capturing.

shftN.name: Knight Transmutation
shftN.description: Move a Knight one square in any orthogonal or diagonal direction, no capturing.

shftB.name: Bishop Conversion
shftB.description: Move a Bishop one square in any orthogonal direction, no capturing.

shftR.name: Rook Modulation
shftR.description: Move a Rook one square in any diagonal direction, no capturing.

shftT.name: Teleportation
shftT.description: Move a friendly piece expcept to any empty square within your first three ranks.

swapDEP.name: Ally Translocate
swapDEP.description: Swap the positions of a friendly minor or major piece (no P, H, V, K).

swapADJ.name: Proximity Translocate
swapADJ.description: Swap the positions of any orthogonally adjacent pieces, no Pawn promotions or swaping just your opponent's pieces.

modsREA.name: Iron Reach
modsREA.description: Friendly Vanguard has usual moveset with hopping plus the Queen move pattern with no hopping. Royalties take precedent.

modsEXT.name: Omni Gaze
modsEXT.description: You may summon amongst the whole board.

modsFUG.name: Sovereign Fugitive
modsFUG.description: Castle while in or through check.

modsTRO.name: Torjan Gambit
modsTRO.description: If your opponent can legally capture you via en passant, they must.

modsINH.name: Legacy Ascension
modsINH.description: Friendly Pawns promote one rank early.

modsSUS.name: Veil of Inaction
modsSUS.description: Prevent any captures, checks or promotions for 3 turns.

modsPHA.name: Phantom Mist
modsPHA.description: Your pieces become invisible to your opponent for 3 turns.

modsIMP.name: Tactical Vision
modsIMP.description: The engine gives you a hint for the best move, from sqaure only.

modsORA.name: Oracle Whisper
modsORA.description: The engine gives you a hint for the best move, from and to square.

modsTEM.name: Temporal Pincer
modsTEM.description: Get engine's best calculate line of moves after 3 seconds of thinking time.

modsGLI.name: Neural Scrambler
modsGLI.description: The next engine move is randomized.
